entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
